name: Annotation
title: Gcloud
Vision
Annotation
description:
Annotation

The results of all requested image annotations.

See Project#annotate and Image.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
vision = gcloud.vision
image = vision.image "path/to/face.jpg"

annotation = vision.annotate image, faces: true, labels: true
annotation.faces.count #=> 1
annotation.labels.count #=> 4
annotation.text #=> nil

methods.name: faces
title: Gcloud
Vision
Annotation#faces
methods.description: The results of face detection.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
vision = gcloud.vision
image = vision.image "path/to/face.jpg"

annotation = vision.annotate image, faces: true
annotation.faces.count #=> 1
face = annotation.faces.first

methods.name: face
title: Gcloud
Vision
Annotation#face
methods.description: The first face result, if there is one.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
vision = gcloud.vision
image = vision.image "path/to/face.jpg"

annotation = vision.annotate image, faces: 1
face = annotation.face

methods.name: face?
title: Gcloud
Vision
Annotation#face?
methods.description: Whether there is at least one result from face detection.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
vision = gcloud.vision
image = vision.image "path/to/face.jpg"

annotation = vision.annotate image, faces: 1
annotation.face? #=> true

Vision
Annotation#landmark?
